mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.part_name as partName, t.insert_time as insertTime, t.update_time as updateTime, t.update_user_pcode as updateUserPcode
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(RES.talOverTime) as totalOverTime, SUM(RES.overTimeRate) as overTimeRate, SUM(RES.periodOvertimeRate) AS periodOvertimeRate FROM( SELECT overtime.workYear, overtime.workMonth, overtime.talOverTime, overtime.talOverTime/((MWT.work_day * MWT.work_time * 3600 * (select count(1) from mf_user_info))) * 100 as overTimeRate, 0 AS periodOvertimeRate FROM ( SELECT MW.work_year AS workYear, MW.work_month AS workMonth, SUM( CASE WHEN (( MP.part_name NOT IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 )) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name NOT IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN (1,2,3,4,5)) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 )) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN (1,2,3,4,5)) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) ELSE TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) END ) AS talOverTime FROM mf_work MW LEFT JOIN mf_user_info MUI ON MW.user_id = MUI.id LEFT JOIN mf_part MP ON MUI.part_id = MP.id WHERE MW.end_time > '17:30:00'
AND MW.work_date >= #{query.workStartDate}
AND MW.work_date <= #{query.workEndDate}
GROUP BY MW.work_year, MW.work_month ) overtime LEFT JOIN mf_work_time MWT ON MWT.work_year = overtime.workYear AND MWT.work_month = overtime.workMonth UNION ALL SELECT overtime.workYear +1 as workYear, overtime.workMonth, 0 AS totalOverTime, 0 as overTimeRate, overtime.talOverTime/((MWT.work_day * MWT.work_time * 3600 * (select count(1) from mf_user_info))) AS periodOvertimeRate FROM ( SELECT MW.work_year AS workYear, MW.work_month AS workMonth, SUM( CASE WHEN (( MP.part_name NOT IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 )) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name NOT IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN (1,2,3,4,5)) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 )) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN (1,2,3,4,5)) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) ELSE TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) END ) AS talOverTime FROM mf_work MW LEFT JOIN mf_user_info MUI ON MW.user_id = MUI.id LEFT JOIN mf_part MP ON MUI.part_id = MP.id WHERE MW.end_time > '17:30:00'
AND MW.work_date >= SUBDATE(#{query.workStartDate},interval 1 year)
AND MW.work_date <= SUBDATE(#{query.workEndDate},interval 1 year)
GROUP BY MW.work_year, MW.work_month ) overtime LEFT JOIN mf_work_time MWT ON MWT.work_year = overtime.workYear AND MWT.work_month = overtime.workMonth ) RES

SELECT SUM(RES.talOverTime) as totalOverTime, SUM(RES.overTimeRate) as overTimeRate, SUM(RES.periodOvertimeRate) AS periodOvertimeRate FROM ( SELECT overtime.workYear, overtime.workMonth, overtime.talOverTime, overtime.talOverTime / ((MWT.work_day * MWT.work_time * 3600 * (SELECT count( A.id ) FROM mf_user_info A LEFT JOIN mf_part B ON A.part_id = B.ID WHERE B.part_name IN ( '生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )))) * 100 AS overTimeRate, 0 as periodOvertimeRate FROM ( SELECT MW.work_year AS workYear, MW.work_month AS workMonth, SUM( CASE
WHEN ( ( MP.part_name NOT IN ( '生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' ) ) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 ) ) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * 2 ELSE TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) END ) AS talOverTime FROM mf_work MW LEFT JOIN mf_user_info MUI ON MW.user_id = MUI.id LEFT JOIN mf_part MP ON MUI.part_id = MP.id WHERE MW.end_time > '17:30:00' AND MP.part_name IN ( '生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )
AND MW.work_date >= #{query.workStartDate}
AND MW.work_date <= #{query.workEndDate}
GROUP BY MW.work_year, MW.work_month ) overtime LEFT JOIN mf_work_time MWT ON MWT.work_year = overtime.workYear AND MWT.work_month = overtime.workMonth UNION ALL SELECT overtime.workYear +1, overtime.workMonth, 0 AS talOverTime, 0 AS overTimeRate, overtime.talOverTime / ((MWT.work_day * MWT.work_time * 3600 * (SELECT count( A.id ) FROM mf_user_info A LEFT JOIN mf_part B ON A.part_id = B.ID WHERE B.part_name IN ( '生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )))) * 100 as periodOvertimeRate FROM ( SELECT MW.work_year AS workYear, MW.work_month AS workMonth, SUM( CASE
WHEN ( ( MP.part_name NOT IN ( '生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' ) ) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 ) ) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * 2 ELSE TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) END ) AS talOverTime FROM mf_work MW LEFT JOIN mf_user_info MUI ON MW.user_id = MUI.id LEFT JOIN mf_part MP ON MUI.part_id = MP.id WHERE MW.end_time > '17:30:00' AND MP.part_name IN ( '生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )
AND MW.work_date >= SUBDATE(#{query.workStartDate},interval 1 year)
AND MW.work_date <= SUBDATE(#{query.workEndDate},interval 1 year)
GROUP BY MW.work_year, MW.work_month ) overtime LEFT JOIN mf_work_time MWT ON MWT.work_year = overtime.workYear AND MWT.work_month = overtime.workMonth ) RES

SELECT SUM(RES.talOverTime) as totalOverTime, SUM(RES.overTimeRate) as overTimeRate, SUM(RES.periodOvertimeRate) AS periodOvertimeRate FROM ( SELECT overtime.workYear, overtime.workMonth, overtime.talOverTime, overtime.talOverTime / ((MWT.work_day * MWT.work_time * 3600 * (SELECT count( 1 ) FROM mf_user_info A LEFT JOIN mf_part B ON A.part_id = B.ID WHERE B.part_name NOT IN ( '生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )))) * 100 AS overTimeRate, 0 as periodOvertimeRate FROM ( SELECT MW.work_year AS workYear, MW.work_month AS workMonth, SUM( CASE
WHEN ( ( MP.part_name NOT IN ( '生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' ) ) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 ) ) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * 2 ELSE TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) END ) AS talOverTime FROM mf_work MW LEFT JOIN mf_user_info MUI ON MW.user_id = MUI.id LEFT JOIN mf_part MP ON MUI.part_id = MP.id WHERE MW.end_time > '17:30:00' AND MP.part_name NOT IN ( '生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )
AND MW.work_date >= #{query.workStartDate}
AND MW.work_date <= #{query.workEndDate}
GROUP BY MW.work_year, MW.work_month ) overtime LEFT JOIN mf_work_time MWT ON MWT.work_year = overtime.workYear AND MWT.work_month = overtime.workMonth UNION ALL SELECT overtime.workYear + 1, overtime.workMonth, 0 AS talOverTime, 0 AS overTimeRate, overtime.talOverTime / ((MWT.work_day * MWT.work_time * 3600 * (SELECT count( 1 ) FROM mf_user_info A LEFT JOIN mf_part B ON A.part_id = B.ID WHERE B.part_name NOT IN ( '生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )))) * 100 as periodOvertimeRate FROM ( SELECT MW.work_year AS workYear, MW.work_month AS workMonth, SUM( CASE
WHEN ( ( MP.part_name NOT IN ( '生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' ) ) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 ) ) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * 2 ELSE TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) END ) AS talOverTime FROM mf_work MW LEFT JOIN mf_user_info MUI ON MW.user_id = MUI.id LEFT JOIN mf_part MP ON MUI.part_id = MP.id WHERE MW.end_time > '17:30:00' AND MP.part_name NOT IN ( '生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )
AND MW.work_date >= SUBDATE(#{query.workStartDate},interval 1 year)
AND MW.work_date <= SUBDATE(#{query.workEndDate},interval 1 year)
GROUP BY MW.work_year, MW.work_month ) overtime LEFT JOIN mf_work_time MWT ON MWT.work_year = overtime.workYear AND MWT.work_month = overtime.workMonth ) RES

SELECT RES.id, RES.partName, RES.workYear, RES.workMonth, SUM(RES.talOverTime) as talOverTime, SUM(RES.lastOverTime) as lastOverTime FROM ( SELECT MP.id AS id, MP.part_name AS partName, MW.work_year AS workYear, MW.work_month AS workMonth, SUM( CASE WHEN (( MP.part_name NOT IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 )) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name NOT IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN (1,2,3,4,5)) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 )) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN (1,2,3,4,5)) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) ELSE TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) END) AS talOverTime, 0 as lastOverTime FROM mf_work MW LEFT JOIN mf_user_info MUI ON MW.user_id = MUI.id LEFT JOIN mf_part MP ON MUI.part_id = MP.id WHERE MW.end_time > '17:30:00' AND MP.id = #{query.partId} AND (MW.work_year >= #{query.workYearStart} AND MW.work_month >= #{query.workMonthStart}) AND (MW.work_year <= #{query.workYearEnd} AND MW.work_month <= #{query.workMonthEnd}) GROUP BY MP.id, MP.part_name, MW.work_year, MW.work_month UNION ALL SELECT MP.id AS id, MP.part_name AS partName, MW.work_year + 1 AS workYear, MW.work_month AS workMonth, 0 AS talOverTime, SUM( CASE WHEN (( MP.part_name NOT IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 )) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name NOT IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN (1,2,3,4,5)) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 )) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN (1,2,3,4,5)) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) ELSE TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) END) as lastOverTime FROM mf_work MW LEFT JOIN mf_user_info MUI ON MW.user_id = MUI.id LEFT JOIN mf_part MP ON MUI.part_id = MP.id WHERE MW.end_time > '17:30:00' AND MP.id = #{query.partId} AND (MW.work_year >= #{query.workYearStart} -1 AND MW.work_month >= #{query.workMonthStart}) AND (MW.work_year <= #{query.workYearEnd} -1 AND MW.work_month <= #{query.workMonthEnd}) GROUP BY MP.id, MP.part_name, MW.work_year, MW.work_month ) RES GROUP BY RES.id, RES.partName, RES.workYear, RES.workMonth

SELECT RES.id, RES.partName, RES.workYear, RES.workMonth, RES.workDate, SUM(RES.talOverTime) as talOverTime FROM ( SELECT MP.id AS id, MP.part_name AS partName, MW.work_year AS workYear, MW.work_month AS workMonth, MW.work_date AS workDate, SUM( CASE WHEN (( MP.part_name NOT IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 )) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name NOT IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN (1,2,3,4,5)) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 )) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN (1,2,3,4,5)) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) ELSE TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) END) AS talOverTime FROM mf_work MW LEFT JOIN mf_user_info MUI ON MW.user_id = MUI.id LEFT JOIN mf_part MP ON MUI.part_id = MP.id WHERE MW.end_time > '17:30:00' AND MP.id = #{query.partId} AND MW.work_date >= DATE_FORMAT( SUBDATE(#{query.workStartDate},DATE_FORMAT(#{query.workStartDate},'%w')-1), '%Y-%m-%d') AND MW.work_date <= DATE_FORMAT( SUBDATE(#{query.workStartDate},DATE_FORMAT(#{query.workStartDate},'%w')-7), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY MP.id, MP.part_name, MW.work_year, MW.work_month, MW.work_date UNION ALL SELECT MP.id AS id, MP.part_name AS partName, MW.work_year AS workYear, MW.work_month AS workMonth, MW.work_date AS workDate, SUM( CASE WHEN (( MP.part_name NOT IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 )) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name NOT IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN (1,2,3,4,5)) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 )) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) WHEN (( MP.part_name IN ('生产运行开发中心', '质控中心', '商务营销开发中心', '行政服务开发中心' )) AND MW.`week` IN (1,2,3,4,5)) THEN TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) ELSE TIME_TO_SEC( TIMEDIFF( end_time, '16:30:00' ) ) END) as talOverTime FROM mf_work MW LEFT JOIN mf_user_info MUI ON MW.user_id = MUI.id LEFT JOIN mf_part MP ON MUI.part_id = MP.id WHERE MW.end_time > '17:30:00' AND MP.id = #{query.partId} AND MW.work_date >= DATE_FORMAT( SUBDATE(DATE_ADD(#{query.workStartDate},INTERVAL -1 YEAR),DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{query.workStartDate},INTERVAL -1 YEAR),'%w')-1), '%Y-%m-%d') AND MW.work_date <= DATE_FORMAT( SUBDATE(DATE_ADD(#{query.workStartDate},INTERVAL -1 YEAR),DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{query.workStartDate},INTERVAL -1 YEAR),'%w')-7), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY MP.id, MP.part_name, MW.work_year, MW.work_month, MW.work_date ) RES GROUP BY RES.id, RES.partName, RES.workYear, RES.workMonth, RES.workDate
